ParaDef.Info: Displays the ingress or egress QoS Policy ID for which to display matching SAPs. Values-1 to 65535.
Displays SAPs using this traffic description (applies only to the 7750 SR).
Displays the ingress or egress filter policy ID for which to display matching SAPs. Values-1 to 65535.
Displays the session authentication policy for which to display matching SAPs.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Specifies matching SAPs with the specified IP interface.
Displays the IP address of the interface for which to display matching SAPs. Values-1.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255.
Displays the IP interface name for which to display matching SAPs.
